name: Twisted Air Fryer Shrimp Tacos
author: thedailygourmet
summary: It only takes a short time to assemble these air fried shrimp tacos with the help of an air fryer. Oh and did you know the shell on a shrimp is edible?! That's something my fishmonger told me! I wasn't brave enough to try it, but feel free to, if you want!
ingredients: 1 pound extra large shrimp (16-20 per lb.), shell on, deveined
1  red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 bunch chopped green onions, white parts only
3 tablespoons crema con sal (salted Mexican-style sour cream)
¼ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend, or to taste
directions: Combine vodka, orange juice, garlic, cumin, coriander, smoked paprika, paprika, and cayenne in a resealable plastic bag
Add shrimp and marinate for 20 minutes
Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 minutes
Drain off marinade and air-fry shrimp for 6 minutes
Add cilantro, bell pepper, and the white parts of the green onion
Roughly chop shrimp (optional) and add to the tacos
Top with crema con sal and cheese
